title: Overshadowed
overview: Overshadowed tells the story of a young Irish vlogger called Imogene whose life spirals out of control when she meets the monster of anorexia personified.Shot in an innovative new format, Overshadowed tells Imogene's story through a series of vlogs. All 8 episodes are told from Imo's point of view, giving a unique documentary-style insight in to teenage life and her increasingly fragile mental state.
